null.verse 37:46: jasného, jenž rozkoší pro pijící je,
null.verse 37:47: v něm opojnosti není a nebudou jím zmoženi.
null.verse 37:48: Vedle nich budou dívky zrak klopící, okaté,
null.verse 37:49: jako by to perly byly skryté.
null.verse 37:50: A přiblíží se k sobě navzájem a bude se vyptávat jeden druhého,
null.verse 37:51: a řekne jeden z nich: "Měl jsem přítele dobrého,
null.verse 37:52: jenž říkával:, Patříš také mezi ty, kdo za pravdivé prohlašují varování,
null.verse 37:53: že až zemřeme a staneme se prachem a kostmi, i před soud budeme postaveni?"
null.verse 37:54: A řekne: "Nechcete se tam vzhůru podívat?"
null.verse 37:55: A sám vzhůru pohlédne a spatří přítele svého uprostřed pekla stát,
null.verse 37:56: i zavolá naň: "Při Bohu, málem jsi mne zahubil,
null.verse 37:57: a kdyby nebylo dobrodiní Pána mého, také bych mezi předvedenými byl!
null.verse 37:58: Což vskutku již nezemřeme,
null.verse 37:59: jen touto svou smrtí první, a potrestáni nebudeme?
null.verse 37:60: To věru je štěstí nesmírné!"
null.verse 37:61: Nechť k něčemu podobnému se upíná úsilí!
null.verse 37:62: A co je lepší: toto, anebo strom Zaqqúm jako pohoštění?
null.verse 37:63: A učinili jsme jej pro nespravedlivé předmětem pokušení,
null.verse 37:64: a je to strom, jenž vyrůstá z pekla základů,
null.verse 37:65: a jeho plody jsou jak hlavy satanů
null.verse 37:66: a věru z nich budou jíst a břicha svá si jimi naplní
null.verse 37:67: a pak je směsí vody vroucí zapijí
null.verse 37:68: a posléze se věru do pekla navrátí.
null.verse 37:69: A předky své nalezli vskutku v bloudění,
null.verse 37:70: a přece sami po jejich stopách spěchají.
null.verse 37:71: Již před nimi zbloudila většina národů starých,
null.verse 37:72: ačkoliv jsme k nim varovatele posílali.
null.verse 37:73: Pohleď však, jaký byl konec varovaných
null.verse 37:74: kromě služebníků Božích upřímných!
null.verse 37:75: O pomoc Nás kdys Noe zavolal a jak výtečně prosby splňujeme
null.verse 37:76: a před pohromou nesmírnou jsme jej i s rodinou jeho zachránili;
null.verse 37:77: a učinili jsme jeho potomky jedinými, kdož přežili,
null.verse 37:78: a u posledních jsme mu požehnali:
null.verse 37:79: Mír budiž s Noem mezi vším lidstvem!
null.verse 37:80: Takto odměňujeme dobro konající,
null.verse 37:81: vždyť on byl služebník Náš věřící!
null.verse 37:82: A potom jsme všechny ostatní utopili.
null.verse 37:83: K jeho přívržencům také Abraham náležel,
null.verse 37:84: když k Pánu svému se srdcem čistým přišel
null.verse 37:85: a otci svému a lidu svému pravil: "Co to uctíváte?
null.verse 37:86: Což falešná božstva místo Boha si žádáte?
null.verse 37:87: A co o Pánu lidstva soudíte?"
null.verse 37:88: A pohled svůj ke hvězdám upřel
null.verse 37:89: a zvolal: "Věru jsem ochořel!"
null.verse 37:90: I odvrátili se od něho, záda mu ukazujíce.
null.verse 37:91: Abraham pak vnikl k božstvům jejich a řekl: "Co že nejíte
null.verse 37:92: a co je s vámi, že nemluvíte?"
null.verse 37:93: A vrhl se na ně, zasazuje jim úder pravicí,
null.verse 37:94: však přiblížili se k němu lidé běžící.
null.verse 37:95: I otázal se: "Chcete uctívat, co sami jste vytesali,
null.verse 37:96: zatímco je to Bůh, jenž stvořil vás i to, co jste udělali?"
null.verse 37:97: I zvolali: "Postavte pro něj hranici a vhoďte jej v oheň hořící!"
null.verse 37:98: Takto mu chtěli úklad nastrojit, však poníženými jsme je učinili.
null.verse 37:99: I pravil Abraham: "K Pánu svému půjdu, aby mne správně řídil.
null.verse 37:100: Pane, dejž mi syna, jenž patřit bude mezi bezúhonné!
null.verse 37:101: A oznámili jsme mu radostnou zvěst o chlapci povahy mírné.
null.verse 37:102: A když dospěl do věku, kdy s otcem se mohl podílet na úsilí, řekl Abraham: "Synáčku, viděl jsem ve snu, že tě mám obětovat; uvaž a řekni, jaké mínění máš?" I odvětil: "Otče můj, učiň, co ti bylo poručeno; a bude-li Bůh chtít, mne věru neochvějným shledáš.
null.verse 37:103: A když se oba do vůle Boží odevzdali a on položil ho čelem k zemi,
null.verse 37:105: věru jsi již prokázal, že vidění jsi za pravdu měl - a takto ty, kdož dobré činí, odměňujeme -
null.verse 37:106: vždyť byla to jen zjevná zkouška!"
null.verse 37:107: A velkou obětí jsme syna jeho vykoupili
null.verse 37:108: a u posledních jsme mu požehnali:
null.verse 37:110: Takto odměňujeme dobro konající,
null.verse 37:111: vždyť on byl služebník Náš věřící!
null.verse 37:112: A oznámili jsme mu radostnou zvěst o Izákovi, jenž prorok byl, k bezúhonným patřící.
null.verse 37:113: Pak požehnali jsme jemu i Izákovi; a mezi jejich potomky jsou někteří, kdož dobro konají, však jiní sami na sobě křivdu zjevnou páchají.
null.verse 37:114: A dobrodiním jsme také Mojžíše a Áróna zahrnuli
null.verse 37:115: a před pohromou nesmírnou jsme je oba i lid jejich zachránili
null.verse 37:116: a pomoc jsme jim poskytli, takže vítěznými se stali,
null.verse 37:117: a Písmo nanejvýš zřetelné jsme jim darovali
null.verse 37:118: a oba po stezce přímé jsme vedli
null.verse 37:119: a u posledních jsme jim požehnali:
null.verse 37:120: Mír budiž s Mojžíšem a Árónem!
null.verse 37:121: Takto odměňujeme dobro konající,
null.verse 37:122: vždyť oba patří mezi služebníky Naše věřící!
null.verse 37:123: Také Eliáš byl z vyslanců Božích,
null.verse 37:124: když k lidu svému pravil: "Což bohabojní nebudete, a
null.verse 37:125: Baala vzývat chcete a nejlepšího ze stvořitelů opustíte,
null.verse 37:126: Boha, Pána svého i Pána vašich předků dávných?"
null.verse 37:127: Však za lháře ho prohlásili, a věru budou předvedeni
null.verse 37:128: kromě těch, kdož služebníky Božími upřímnými byli.
null.verse 37:129: A u posledních jsme mu požehnali:
null.verse 37:131: Takto odměňujeme dobro konající,
null.verse 37:132: vždyť on byl služebník Náš věřící!
null.verse 37:133: A také Lot byl vskutku mezi Božími vyslanci,
null.verse 37:134: když jsme jej i rodinu jeho celou zachránili
null.verse 37:135: kromě stařeny jedné, jež zůstala s opozdilci,
null.verse 37:136: a potom jsme všechny ostatní zahubili.
null.verse 37:137: A věru kolem měst jejich za jitra procházíte
null.verse 37:138: i za noci; což to nepochopíte?
null.verse 37:139: A rovněž Jonáš jedním z vyslanců Božích byl,
null.verse 37:140: když na loď naloženou se uchýlil
null.verse 37:141: a vrhal los a byl tím, jenž ztratil,
null.verse 37:142: a pohltila jej ryba, zatímco pokárání zasloužil.
null.verse 37:143: A kdyby nebyl z těch, kdož Boha oslavují,
null.verse 37:144: byl by jistě v břiše jejím zůstal až do dne vzkříšení.
null.verse 37:145: A vyvrhli jsme jej chorého na břeh pustý
null.verse 37:146: a dali jsme nad ním vyrůst keři tykvovému.
null.verse 37:147: Potom jsme jej ke sto tisícům či více nevěřícím poslali,
null.verse 37:148: a uvěřili a užívání života jsme jim na čas popřáli.
null.verse 37:149: Dotaž se jich, proč Pán tvůj má dcery mít, když oni přece mají syny,
null.verse 37:150: či zda byli svědky toho, že stvořili jsme anděly jako ženy?
null.verse 37:151: Což není to jen výmysl jejich, když hovoří:
null.verse 37:152: Bůh zplodil - a věru jsou to lháři!
null.verse 37:153: A že by si místo synů vyvolil dcery?
null.verse 37:154: Co je s vámi, že máte takové názory?
null.verse 37:156: Anebo snad pravomoc zjevnou k tomu máte?
null.verse 37:157: Předložte tedy Písmo své, jste-li pravdomluvní!
null.verse 37:158: A učinili Boha s džiny příbuzným, však džinové dobře již vědí, že sami budou před Pána předvedeni.
null.verse 37:159: Oč slavnější je Bůh než to, co lživě Mu připisují,
null.verse 37:160: kromě služebníků Božích upřímných.
null.verse 37:161: A ani vy, ani to, co uctíváte,
null.verse 37:162: nikoho proti Bohu vzbouřit nemůžete
null.verse 37:163: kromě toho, jenž hořet bude v pekle.
null.verse 37:164: Není mezi námi nikoho, kdo by neměl místo určené,
null.verse 37:165: my věru pak jsme ti, kdo v řadách stojí,
null.verse 37:166: a také ti, kdož Pána svého oslavují!
null.verse 37:168: Kdybychom měli nějaké připomenutí od předků svých dávných,
null.verse 37:169: věru bychom byli také ze služebníků Božích upřímných!"
null.verse 37:170: Však přesto v ně nevěří a záhy poznají!
null.verse 37:171: Slovo Naše již dříve bylo dáno služebníkům Našim poslaným,
null.verse 37:172: že od Nás pomoc vždy dostanou
null.verse 37:173: a že vojska Naše pro ně vítězství přinesou.
null.verse 37:174: Odvrať se od nich na dobu krátkou
null.verse 37:175: a pozoruj je; však oni také záhy zpozorují!
null.verse 37:176: Cožpak doopravdy uspíšení trestu Našeho požadují?
null.verse 37:177: Až pak trest na jejich nádvoří sestoupí, špatné to bude jitro pro ty, kdož byli varováni marně.
null.verse 37:178: Odvrať se tedy od nich dočasně
null.verse 37:179: a pozoruj je, však oni také záhy zpozorují!
null.verse 37:180: Oč slavnější je Pán tvůj, Pán moci veškeré, než to, co mu lživě připisují!
null.verse 37:182: a chvála Bohu, Pánu lidstva! Božím

null.verse 37:1: Bij hen, die zich in rijen scharen.
null.verse 37:3: En bij de verkondigers der Vermaning.
null.verse 37:4: Voorwaar, (voorwaar), uw God is één (enig God),
null.verse 37:5: Heer der hemelen en der aarde en van alles wat er tussen is, de Heer van het Oosten.
null.verse 37:6: Wij hebben de laagste hemel met sterren versierd.
null.verse 37:7: Als bescherming tegen iedere opstandige Satan.
null.verse 37:8: Zij kunnen van de verheven bijeenkomst niets horen en zij worden van elke kant verdreven.
null.verse 37:9: Als verworpenen en er is voor hen een voortdurende straf;
null.verse 37:10: Maar hij die steelsgewijze opvangt, hem achtervolgt een heldere vlam.
null.verse 37:11: Vraag hun (de ongelovigen) of zij moeilijker zijn te scheppen, dan andere (dingen) die Wij hebben geschapen.
null.verse 37:12: Neen, gij verwondert u en zij spotten.
null.verse 37:13: En wanneer zij vermaand worden, trekken zij er geen lering uit.
null.verse 37:14: En wanneer zij een teken zien, bespotten zij het.
null.verse 37:15: En zij zeggen: "Dit is niets dan een klaarblijkelijke tovenarij.
null.verse 37:16: "Zullen wij wanneer wij dood zijn en stof en beenderen zijn geworden, worden opgewekt?
null.verse 37:18: Zeg: "Ja, terwijl gij vernederd zult zijn.
null.verse 37:19: Er zal slechts één roep zijn en ziet, zij zullen beginnen te zien.
null.verse 37:20: Dan zullen zij zeggen: "Wee ons! Dit is de Dag der vergelding.
null.verse 37:21: (God zal zeggen:) "Dit is de Dag der Beslissing die gij placht te verloochenen.
null.verse 37:22: Verzamelt de onrechtvaardigen, hun metgezellen en hetgeen zij aanbaden
null.verse 37:23: Naast God.
null.verse 37:24: Doch houdt hen staande want zij moeten worden ondervraagd.
null.verse 37:25: "Wat scheelt u dat gij elkander niet helpt?"
null.verse 37:26: Neen, op die Dag zullen zij onderworpen zijn.
null.verse 37:27: Sommigen hunner zullen zich tot anderen wenden, elkander wederkerig ondervragend.
null.verse 37:28: Zij zullen zeggen: "Voorwaar, gij placht ons op de goede weg tegen te houden.
null.verse 37:29: Zij zullen antwoorden: "Neen, gij waart zelf geen gelovigen.
null.verse 37:30: En wij hadden geen macht over u, maar gij waart een overtredend volk.
null.verse 37:31: Nu is het woord van onze Heer omtrent ons werkelijkheid geworden.
null.verse 37:32: En wij deden u dwalen omdat wij zelf in dwaling waren.
null.verse 37:33: Waarlijk, op die Dag zullen zij allen deelgenoten zijn in de straf.
null.verse 37:34: Zo behandelen Wij de schuldigen;
null.verse 37:35: Voorzeker toen er tot hen werd gezegd: "Er is geen God naast God", waren zij vanmatigend.
null.verse 37:36: En zeiden: "Zullen wij onze Goden voor die waanzinnige dichter opgeven?"
null.verse 37:37: Neen, hij is met de Waarheid gekomen en heeft die van de (vroegere) boodschappers bevestigd.
null.verse 37:38: Gij zult de pijnlijke straf gewis ondergaan.
null.verse 37:39: En gij zult slechts worden vergolden voor hetgeen gij deedt.
null.verse 37:40: Maar de uitverkoren dienaren van God.
null.verse 37:41: Zullen een bekende voorziening ontvangen;
null.verse 37:42: Zij zullen vruchten ontvangen, en worden geëerd,
null.verse 37:44: Op rustbanken.
null.verse 37:45: En een beker zal hun worden rondgereikt uit een stromende bron.
null.verse 37:46: Helder, smakelijk voor de drinkenden,
null.verse 37:47: Waardoor geen dronkenschap zal ontstaans noch zullen zij er door worden uitgeput.
null.verse 37:48: En naast hen zullen vrouwen zijn van bescheiden blik met mooie ogen.
null.verse 37:49: Rein, alsof zij zorgvuldig bewaarde eieren waren.
null.verse 37:50: En enigen hunner zullen zich tot anderen wenden, elkander ondervragend.
null.verse 37:51: Een hunner zal zeggen: "Ik had een metgezel,
null.verse 37:52: Die placht te zeggen: "Bevestigt gij inderdaad,
null.verse 37:53: Dat wanneer wij dood zijn en tot stof en beenderen geworden, ons inderdaad wordt vergolden?"
null.verse 37:54: Hij zal vragen: "Wilt gij opzien?"
null.verse 37:55: Dan zal hij kijken en hem in het midden van het Vuur zien.
null.verse 37:56: Hij zal zeggen: "Bij God, gij deedt mij ook bijna te niet gaan.
null.verse 37:57: "En ware het niet door de gunst van mijn Heer, ik zou ook tot hen behoren die daar aanwezig zijn.
null.verse 37:58: Zullen wij niet sterven,
null.verse 37:59: Na onze eerste dood, noch worden gestraft?
null.verse 37:60: Voorwaar, dit is de opperste zegepraal.
null.verse 37:61: Laat daarom de werkers voor zo iets werken.
null.verse 37:62: Is dit een beter onthaal of de boom van Zaqqoem?
null.verse 37:63: Voorzeker, wij hebben deze tot een beproeving voor de onrechtvaardigen gemaakt.
null.verse 37:64: Het is een boom die uit de bodem der hel ontspringt.
null.verse 37:65: De trossen er van zijn als de koppen van duivels.
null.verse 37:66: En zij zullen er zeker van eten en er hun buik mee vullen.
null.verse 37:67: Dan zullen zij bovendien een drank van kokend water ontvangen.
null.verse 37:68: Daarna zal hun terugkeer zeker naar het Vuur zijn.
null.verse 37:69: Zij vonden inderdaad hun voorvaderen in dwaling.
null.verse 37:70: En zij haastten zich in hun voetstappen voort.
null.verse 37:71: En voorzeker dwaalden vóór hen velen der ouden.
null.verse 37:72: En Wij hadden waarschuwers tot hen gezonden.
null.verse 37:73: Ziet dan hoe het einde was van hen die waren gewaarschuwd.
null.verse 37:74: Met uitzondering der uitverkoren dienaren van God.
null.verse 37:75: Noach riep Ons aan, en hoe uitmuntend zijn Wij in het verhoren.
null.verse 37:76: Wij redden hem en zijn familie uit de grote nood;
null.verse 37:77: En Wji maakten zijn nakomelingen tot de overlevenden.
null.verse 37:78: En Wij lieten voor hem onder de komende geslachten (de groet):
null.verse 37:79: Vrede zij Noach onder de volkeren.
null.verse 37:80: Zo belonen Wij inderdaad hen die goed doen.
null.verse 37:81: Hij was voorzeker één Onzer gelovige dienaren.
null.verse 37:82: Dan deden Wij de anderen verdrinken.
null.verse 37:83: En voorwaar, tot zijn partij behoorde Abraham;
null.verse 37:84: Toen hij tot zijn Heer kwam met een deemoedig hart;
null.verse 37:85: En hij tot zijn vader en tot zijn volk zeide: "Wat aanbidt gij?
null.verse 37:86: Kiest gij valse goden naast God?
null.verse 37:87: Hoe denkt gij over de Heer der Werelden?"
null.verse 37:88: En hij (Abraham) redetwistte over de sterren,
null.verse 37:89: En zei: "Ik ben er ziek van.
null.verse 37:90: En zij wendden zich van hem af en gingen weg.
null.verse 37:91: En hij ging heimelijk tot hun goden en zeide: "Waarom eet gij niet,
null.verse 37:92: Wat scheelt u, dat gij niet spreekt?"
null.verse 37:93: Dan begon hij hen met de rechter hand te slaan.
null.verse 37:94: En zij (de afgodendienaren) haastten zich naar hem toe.
null.verse 37:95: Hij zeide: "Aanbidt gij hetgeen gij zelf hebt uitgebeeld,
null.verse 37:96: Terwijl God u en uw handwerk heeft geschapen?"
null.verse 37:97: Zij zeiden: "Laat ons een omheining bouwen en hem in het vuur werpen.
null.verse 37:98: En zij hadden een komplot tegen hem gesmeed, maar Wij vernederden hen.
null.verse 37:99: Hij zeide: "Ik ga naar mijn Heer, Die zal mij leiden.
null.verse 37:100: Mijn Heer, schenk mij een nakomeling die goed zal zijn.
null.verse 37:101: Dan gaven Wij hem de blijde tijding van een verdraagzame zoon.
null.verse 37:102: En toen deze de knapenleeftijd bereikte, zeide hij: "O mijn lieve zoon, ik heb in een droom gezien, dat ik u heb te offeren.
null.verse 37:103: En toen zij zich beiden aan (Gods bevel) hadden onderworpen, en hij hem plat op zijn voorhoofd had gelegd,
null.verse 37:105: Gij hebt de droom reeds vervuld.
null.verse 37:106: Dit was voorzeker een grote beproenng.
null.verse 37:107: En Wij verlosten hem door een groot offer.
null.verse 37:108: En Wij lieten voor hem onder de komende geslachten (de groet):
null.verse 37:110: Zo belonen Wij hen die goed doen.
null.verse 37:111: Voorwaar, hij was één Onzer gelovige dienaren.
null.verse 37:112: Wij gaven hem het blijde nieuws van Izaäk, een profeet onder de rechtvaardigen.
null.verse 37:113: En Wij zegenden hem en Izaäk.
null.verse 37:114: Wij bewezen inderdaad gunsten aan Mozes en Aäron.
null.verse 37:115: En Wij redden hen beiden en hun volk uit een grote nood;
null.verse 37:116: En Wij hielpen hen (tegen de Egyptenaren) en zij waren het die de overwinning verkregen.
null.verse 37:117: En Wij gaven hun het duidelijke boek.
null.verse 37:118: En leidden hen op het rechte pad.
null.verse 37:119: Wij lieten voor hen, onder de komende geslachten (de groet):
null.verse 37:120: "Vrede zij Mozes en Aäron.
null.verse 37:121: Voorzeker zo belonen Wij degenen die goed doen.
null.verse 37:122: Voorwaar zij behoorden tot Onze gelovige dienaren.
null.verse 37:123: En Elias was óók een der boodschappers
null.verse 37:124: Toen hij tot zijn volk zeide, "Wilt gij niet godvruchtig zijn?
null.verse 37:125: Wilt gij Baäl aanroepen en de beste Schepper verzaken,
null.verse 37:126: God, uw Heer en de Heer uwer voorvaderen?"
null.verse 37:127: Maar zij verloochenden hem en zij zullen zeker worden overgeleverd.
null.verse 37:128: Met uitzondering der uitverkoren dienaren van God.
null.verse 37:129: En Wij lieten voor hem onder de komende geslachten (de groet):
null.verse 37:131: Voorzeker zo belonen Wij degenen, die goed doen.
null.verse 37:132: Voorwaar, hij was één Onzer gelovige dienaren.
null.verse 37:133: En Lot was voorzeker óók een der boodschappers.
null.verse 37:134: Toen Wij hem en zijn familieleden redden,
null.verse 37:135: Met uitzoudering van zijn vrouw die tot de achterblijvenden beboorde.
null.verse 37:137: En gij gaat hen (de plaats waar dezen woonden) zeker ’s morgens voorbij
null.verse 37:139: En Jonas was voorzeker ook een der boodchappers.
null.verse 37:140: Toen hij in het geladen schip vluchtte,
null.verse 37:141: En hij lootte en werd (overboord) geworpen.
null.verse 37:142: Een grote vis slokte hem op terwijl hij zelfverwijt had.
null.verse 37:143: Indien hij niet behoorde tot hen die Ons verheerlijken,
null.verse 37:144: Dan zou hij in diens buik zijn gebleven tot de Dag der Opstanding.
null.verse 37:145: Wij wierpen hem op een kaal strand terwijl hij ziek was.
null.verse 37:146: En Wij lieten een pompoen voor hem opgroeien.
null.verse 37:147: En Wij zonden hem als boodschapper tot honderdduizend of meer mensen.
null.verse 37:148: En zij geloofden, daarom gaven Wij hun voor een korte tijd de voorziening (van dit leven).
null.verse 37:149: Vraag hun nu of hun Heer dochters heeft terwijl zij zonen hebben?
null.verse 37:150: Hebben Wij de engelen als vrouwelijke wezens geschapen, terwijl zij getuigen waren?
null.verse 37:151: Welnu, door hun verzinsel zeggen zij:
null.verse 37:152: "God heeft verwekt.
null.verse 37:153: "Heeft Hij dochters gekozen boven zonen?
null.verse 37:154: Wat scheelt u? Hoe oordeelt gij?
null.verse 37:156: Of hebt gij een duidelijk bewijs?
null.verse 37:157: Toont dan uw Boek, indien gij waarachtig zijt.
null.verse 37:158: En zij beweren een bloedverwantschap tussen Hem en de djinn, terwijl de djinn zeer goed weten, dat zij voor Hem zullen worden gebracht.
null.verse 37:159: Verheven is God boven hetgeen zij zeggen.
null.verse 37:160: Met uitzondering van de uitverkoren dienaren van God.
null.verse 37:161: Voorwaar, gij en wat gij aanbidt,
null.verse 37:162: Gij kunt niemand verleiden tegen Hem.
null.verse 37:163: Behalve hem die het Vuur zal binnengaan.
null.verse 37:164: En er is niet één onzer of hij heeft een vaste plaats.
null.verse 37:165: Waarlijk wij zijn degenen die in rijen gerangschikt zijn.
null.verse 37:166: En voorzeker wij verheerlijken (God).
null.verse 37:168: "Als wij een vermaning hadden gehad van de ouden.
null.verse 37:169: Zouden wij zeker God’s uitverkoren dienaren zijn geworden.
null.verse 37:170: Toch verwerpen zij deze, maar zij zullen het weldra te weten komen.
null.verse 37:171: En waarlijk, Ons woord aangaande Onze dienaren, de boodschappers, is reeds uitgesproken.
null.verse 37:172: Voorzeker, zij zijn het die geholpen zullen worden.
null.verse 37:173: En Onze schare is gewis overwinnaar.
null.verse 37:174: Wend u daarom voor een wijle van hen af.
null.verse 37:175: En sla hen gade; want zij zullen het weldra inzien
null.verse 37:176: Willen zij dan Onze straf verhaasten?
null.verse 37:177: Maar wanneer deze op hun land nederdaalt zal de dag slecht zijn voor degenen, die werden gewaarschuwd.
null.verse 37:178: Wend u daarom voor een wijle van hen af.
null.verse 37:179: En let op, zij zullen het weldra inzien.
null.verse 37:180: Verheven is uw Heer, de Heer van Roem en Macht, boven hetgeen zij zeggen!
null.verse 37:182: En alle roem behoort aan God, de Heer der Werelden.

Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:1: By those who set the ranks in battle order
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:2: And those who drive away (the wicked) with reproof
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:3: And those who read (the Word) for a reminder,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:4: Lo! thy Lord is surely One;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:5: Lord of the heavens and of the earth and all that is between them, and Lord of the sun’s risings.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:6: Lo! We have adorned the lowest heaven with an ornament, the planets;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:7: With security from every froward devil.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:8: They cannot listen to the Highest Chiefs for they are pelted from every side,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:9: Outcast, and theirs is a perpetual torment;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:10: Save him who snatcheth a fragment, and there pursueth him a piercing flame
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:11: Then ask them (O Muhammad): Are they stronger as a creation, or those (others) whom we have created ? Lo! We created them of plastic clay.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:12: Nay, but thou dost marvel when they mock
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:13: And heed not when they are reminded,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:14: And seek to scoff when they behold a portent.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:15: And they say: Lo! this is mere magic;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:16: When we are dead and have become dust and bones, shall we then, forsooth, be raised (again) ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:18: Say (O Muhammad): Ye, in truth; and ye will be brought low.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:19: There is but one Shout, and lo! they behold,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:20: And say: Ah, woe for us! This is the Day of Judgment.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:21: This is the Day of Separation, which ye used to deny.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:22: (And it is said unto the angels): Assemble those who did wrong, together with their wives and what they used to worship
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:23: Instead of Allah, and lead them to the path to hell;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:24: And stop them, for they must be questioned.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:25: What aileth you that ye help not one another ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:26: Nay, but this day they make full submission.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:27: And some of them draw near unto others, mutually questioning.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:28: They say: Lo! ye used to come unto us, imposing, (swearing that ye spoke the truth).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:29: They answer: Nay, but ye (yourselves) were not believers.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:30: We had no power over you, but ye were wayward folk.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:31: Now the Word of our Lord hath been fulfilled concerning us.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:33: Then lo! this day they (both) are sharers in the doom.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:34: Lo! thus deal We with the guilty.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:35: For when it was said unto them, There is no God save Allah, they were scornful
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:36: And said: Shall we forsake our gods for a mad poet ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:37: Nay, but he brought the Truth, and he confirmed those sent (before him).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:38: Lo! (now) verily ye taste the painful doom -
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:39: Ye are requited naught save what ye did -
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:41: For them there is a known provision,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:45: A cup from a gushing spring is brought round for them,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:47: Wherein there is no headache nor are they made mad thereby.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:48: And with them are those of modest gaze, with lovely eyes,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:49: (Pure) as they were hidden eggs (of the ostrich).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:50: And some of them draw near unto others, mutually questioning.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:51: A speaker of them saith: Lo! I had a comrade
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:52: Who used to say: Art thou in truth of those who put faith (in his words) ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:53: Can we, when we are dead and have become mere dust and bones - can we (then) verily be brought to book ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:55: Then looketh he and seeth him in the depth of hell.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:56: He saith: By Allah, thou verily didst all but cause my ruin,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:57: And had it not been for the favour of my Lord, I too had been of those haled forth (to doom).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:58: Are we then not to die
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:59: Saving our former death, and are we not to be punished ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:60: Lo! this is the supreme triumph.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:61: For the like of this, then, let the workers work.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:62: Is this better as a welcome, or the tree of Zaqqum ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:63: Lo! We have appointed it a torment for wrong-doers.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:64: Lo! it is a tree that springeth in the heart of hell.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:65: Its crop is as it were the heads of devils
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:66: And lo! they verily must eat thereof, and fill (their) bellies therewith.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:67: And afterward, lo! thereupon they have a drink of boiling water
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:68: And afterward, lo! their return is surely unto hell.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:69: They indeed found their fathers astray,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:70: But they make haste (to follow) in their footsteps.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:71: And verily most of the men of old went astray before them,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:72: And verily We sent among them warners.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:73: Then see the nature of the consequence for those warned,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:75: And Noah verily prayed unto Us, and gracious was the Hearer of his prayer
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:76: And We saved him and his household from the great distress,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:77: And made his seed the survivors,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:78: And left for him among the later folk (the salutation):
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:79: Peace be unto Noah among the peoples!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:80: Lo! thus do We reward the good.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:81: Lo! he is one of Our believing slaves.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:82: Then We did drown the others.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:83: And lo! of his persuasion verily was Abraham
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:84: When he came unto his Lord with a whole heart;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:85: When he said unto his father and his folk: What is it that ye worship ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:86: Is it a falsehood - gods beside Allah - that ye desire ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:87: What then is your opinion of the Lord of the Worlds ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:88: And he glanced a glance at the stars
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:89: Then said: Lo! I feel sick!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:90: And they turned their backs and went away from him.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:91: Then turned he to their gods and said: Will ye not eat ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:92: What aileth you that ye speak not ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:93: Then he attacked them, striking with his right hand.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:94: And (his people) came toward him, hastening.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:95: He said: Worship ye that which ye yourselves do carve
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:96: When Allah hath created you and what ye make ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:97: They said: Build for him a building and fling him in the red-hotfire.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:98: And they designed a snare for him, but We made them the undermost.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:99: And he said: Lo! I am going unto my Lord Who will guide me.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:100: My Lord! Vouchsafe me of the righteous.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:101: So We gave him tidings of a gentle son.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:102: And when (his son) was old enough to walk with him, (Abraham) said: O my dear son, I have seen in a dream that I must sacrifice thee.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:103: Then, when they had both surrendered (to Allah), and he had flung him down upon his face,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:104: We called unto him: O Abraham!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:105: Thou hast already fulfilled the vision.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:106: Lo! that verily was a clear test.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:107: Then We ransomed him with a tremendous victim.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:108: And We left for him among the later folk (the salutation):
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:110: Thus do We reward the good.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:111: Lo! he is one of Our believing slaves.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:112: And we gave him tidings of the birth of Isaac, a prophet of the righteous.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:113: And We blessed him and Isaac.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:114: And We verily gave grace unto Moses and Aaron,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:115: And saved them and their people from the great distress,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:116: And helped them so that they became the victors.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:117: And We gave them the clear Scripture
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:118: And showed them the right path.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:119: And We left for them among the later folk (the salutation):
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:120: Peace be unto Moses and Aaron!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:121: Lo! thus do We reward the good.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:122: Lo! they are two of Our believing slaves.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:123: And lo! Elias was of those sent (to warn),
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:124: When he said unto his folk: Will ye not ward off (evil) ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:125: Will ye cry unto Baal and forsake the Best of creators,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:126: Allah, your Lord and Lord of your forefathers ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:127: But they denied him, so they surely will be haled forth (to the doom)
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:129: And we left for him among the later folk (the salutation):
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:131: Lo! thus do We reward the good.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:132: Lo! he is one of our believing slaves.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:133: And lo! Lot verily was of those sent (to warn).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:134: When We saved him and his household, every one,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:135: Save an old woman among those who stayed behind;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:137: And lo! ye verily pass by (the ruin of) them in the morning
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:138: And at night-time; have ye then no sense ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:139: And lo! Jonah verily was of those sent (to warn)
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:140: When he fled unto the laden ship,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:141: And then drew lots and was of those rejected;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:142: And the fish swallowed him while he was blameworthy;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:143: And had he not been one of those who glorify (Allah)
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:144: He would have tarried in its belly till the day when they are raised;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:145: Then We cast him on a desert shore while he was sick;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:146: And We caused a tree of gourd to grow above him;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:147: And We sent him to a hundred thousand (folk) or more
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:148: And they believed, therefor We gave them comfort for a while.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:149: Now ask them (O Muhammad): Hath thy Lord daughters whereas they have sons ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:150: Or created We the angels females while they were present ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:151: Lo! it is of their falsehood that they say:
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:153: (And again of their falsehood): He hath preferred daughters to sons.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:154: What aileth you ? How judge ye ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:156: Or have ye a clear warrant ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:157: Then produce your writ, if ye are truthful.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:158: And they imagine kinship between him and the jinn, whereas the jinn know well that they will be brought before (Him).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:159: Glorified be Allah from that which they attribute (unto Him),
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:161: Lo! verily, ye and that which ye worship,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:163: Save him who is to burn in hell.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:164: There is not one of us but hath his known position.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:165: Lo! we, even we are they who set the ranks,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:166: Lo! we, even we are they who hymn His praise
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:167: And indeed they used to say:
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:168: If we had but a reminder from the men of old
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:169: We would be single-minded slaves of Allah.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:170: Yet (now that it is come) they disbelieve therein; but they will come to know.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:171: And verily Our word went forth of old unto Our bondmen sent (to warn)
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:172: That they verily would be helped,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:173: And that Our host, they verily would be the victors.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:174: So withdraw from them (O Muhammad) awhile,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:175: And watch, for they will (soon) see.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:176: Would they hasten on Our doom ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:177: But when it cometh home to them, then it will be a hapless morn for those who have been warned.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:179: And watch, for they will (soon) see.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:180: Glorified be thy Lord, the Lord of Majesty, from that which they attribute (unto Him)
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:181: And peace be unto those sent (to warn).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 37:182: And praise be to Allah, Lord of the Worlds! warn).

Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:1: By those who range themselves in ranks,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:2: And so are strong in repelling (evil),
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:3: And thus proclaim the Message (of God)!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:4: Verily, verily, your God is one!-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:5: Lord of the heavens and of the earth and all between them, and Lord of every point at the rising of the sun!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:6: We have indeed decked the lower heaven with beauty (in) the stars,-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:7: (For beauty) and for guard against all obstinate rebellious evil spirits,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:8: (So) they should not strain their ears in the direction of the Exalted Assembly but be cast away from every side,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:9: Repulsed, for they are under a perpetual penalty,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:10: Except such as snatch away something by stealth, and they are pursued by a flaming fire, of piercing brightness.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:11: Just ask their opinion: are they the more difficult to create, or the (other) beings We have created? Them have We created out of a sticky clay!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:12: Truly dost thou marvel, while they ridicule,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:13: And, when they are admonished, pay no heed,-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:14: And, when they see a Sign, turn it to mockery,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:15: And say, "This is nothing but evident sorcery!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:16: "What! when we die, and become dust and bones, shall we (then) be raised up (again)
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:18: Say thou: "Yea, and ye shall then be humiliated (on account of your evil).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:19: Then it will be a single (compelling) cry; and behold, they will begin to see!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:20: They will say, "Ah! Woe to us! This is the Day of Judgment!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:21: (A voice will say,) "This is the Day of Sorting Out, whose truth ye (once) denied!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:22: "Bring ye up", it shall be said, "The wrong-doers and their wives, and the things they worshipped-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:23: "Besides God, and lead them to the Way to the (Fierce) Fire!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:24: "But stop them, for they must be asked:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:25: "’What is the matter with you that ye help not each other?’"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:26: Nay, but that day they shall submit (to Judgment);
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:27: And they will turn to one another, and question one another.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:28: They will say: "It was ye who used to come to us from the right hand (of power and authority)!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:29: They will reply: "Nay, ye yourselves had no Faith!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:30: "Nor had we any authority over you.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:31: "So now has been proved true, against us, the word of our Lord that we shall indeed (have to) taste (the punishment of our sins).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:32: "We led you astray: for truly we were ourselves astray.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:33: Truly, that Day, they will (all) share in the Penalty.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:34: Verily that is how We shall deal with Sinners.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:35: For they, when they were told that there is no god except God, would puff themselves up with Pride,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:36: And say: "What! shall we give up our gods for the sake of a Poet possessed?"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:37: Nay! he has come with the (very) Truth, and he confirms (the Message of) the apostles (before him).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:38: Ye shall indeed taste of the Grievous Penalty;-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:39: But it will be no more than the retribution of (the Evil) that ye have wrought;-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:40: But the sincere (and devoted) Servants of God,-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:41: For them is a Sustenance determined,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:42: Fruits (Delights); and they (shall enjoy) honour and dignity,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:44: Facing each other on Thrones (of Dignity):
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:45: Round will be passed to them a Cup from a clear-flowing fountain,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:46: Crystal-white, of a taste delicious to those who drink (thereof),
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:47: Free from headiness; nor will they suffer intoxication therefrom.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:48: And besides them will be chaste women, restraining their glances, with big eyes (of wonder and beauty).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:49: As if they were (delicate) eggs closely guarded.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:50: Then they will turn to one another and question one another.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:51: One of them will start the talk and say: "I had an intimate companion (on the earth),
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:52: "Who used to say, ’what! art thou amongst those who bear witness to the Truth (of the Message)?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:53: "’When we die and become dust and bones, shall we indeed receive rewards and punishments?’"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:54: (A voice) said: "Would ye like to look down?"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:55: He looked down and saw him in the midst of the Fire.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:56: He said: "By God! thou wast little short of bringing me to perdition!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:57: "Had it not been for the Grace of my Lord, I should certainly have been among those brought (there)!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:58: "Is it (the case) that we shall not die,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:59: "Except our first death, and that we shall not be punished?"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:60: Verily this is the supreme achievement!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:61: For the like of this let all strive, who wish to strive.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:62: Is that the better entertainment or the Tree of Zaqqum?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:63: For We have truly made it (as) a trial for the wrong-doers.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:64: For it is a tree that springs out of the bottom of Hell-Fire:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:65: The shoots of its fruit-stalks are like the heads of devils:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:66: Truly they will eat thereof and fill their bellies therewith.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:67: Then on top of that they will be given a mixture made of boiling water.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:68: Then shall their return be to the (Blazing) Fire.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:69: Truly they found their fathers on the wrong Path;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:70: So they (too) were rushed down on their footsteps!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:71: And truly before them, many of the ancients went astray;-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:72: But We sent aforetime, among them, (apostles) to admonish them;-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:73: Then see what was the end of those who were admonished (but heeded not),-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:74: Except the sincere (and devoted) Servants of God.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:75: (In the days of old), Noah cried to Us, and We are the best to hear prayer.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:76: And We delivered him and his people from the Great Calamity,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:77: And made his progeny to endure (on this earth);
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:78: And We left (this blessing) for him among generations to come in later times:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:79: "Peace and salutation to Noah among the nations!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:80: Thus indeed do we reward those who do right.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:81: For he was one of our believing Servants.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:82: Then the rest we overwhelmed in the Flood.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:83: Verily among those who followed his Way was Abraham.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:84: Behold! he approached his Lord with a sound heart.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:85: Behold! he said to his father and to his people, "What is that which ye worship?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:86: "Is it a falsehood- gods other than God- that ye desire?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:87: "Then what is your idea about the Lord of the worlds?"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:88: Then did he cast a glance at the Stars.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:89: And he said, "I am indeed sick (at heart)!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:90: So they turned away from him, and departed.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:91: Then did he turn to their gods and said, "will ye not eat (of the offerings before you)?.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:92: "What is the matter with you that ye speak not (intelligently)?"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:93: Then did he turn upon them, striking (them) with the right hand.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:94: Then came (the worshippers) with hurried steps, and faced (him).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:95: He said: "Worship ye that which ye have (yourselves) carved?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:96: "But God has created you and your handwork!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:97: They said, "Build him a furnace, and throw him into the blazing fire!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:98: (This failing), they then sought a stratagem against him, but We made them the ones most humiliated!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:99: He said: "I will go to my Lord! He will surely guide me!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:100: "O my Lord! Grant me a righteous (son)!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:101: So We gave him the good news of a boy ready to suffer and forbear.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:102: Then, when (the son) reached (the age of) (serious) work with him, he said: "O my son! I see in vision that I offer thee in sacrifice: Now see what is thy view!" (The son) said: "O my father! Do as thou art commanded: thou will find me, if God so wills one practising Patience and Constancy!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:103: So when they had both submitted their wills (to God), and he had laid him prostrate on his forehead (for sacrifice),
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:104: We called out to him "O Abraham!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:105: "Thou hast already fulfilled the vision!" - thus indeed do We reward those who do right.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:106: For this was obviously a trial-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:107: And We ransomed him with a momentous sacrifice:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:108: And We left (this blessing) for him among generations (to come) in later times:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:110: Thus indeed do We reward those who do right.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:111: For he was one of our believing Servants.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:112: And We gave him the good news of Isaac - a prophet,- one of the Righteous.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:113: We blessed him and Isaac: but of their progeny are (some) that do right, and (some) that obviously do wrong, to their own souls.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:114: Again (of old) We bestowed Our favour on Moses and Aaron,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:115: And We delivered them and their people from (their) Great Calamity;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:116: And We helped them, so they overcame (their troubles);
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:117: And We gave them the Book which helps to make things clear;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:118: And We guided them to the Straight Way.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:119: And We left (this blessing) for them among generations (to come) in later times:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:120: "Peace and salutation to Moses and Aaron!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:121: Thus indeed do We reward those who do right.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:122: For they were two of our believing Servants.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:123: So also was Elias among those sent (by Us).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:124: Behold, he said to his people, "Will ye not fear (God)?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:125: "Will ye call upon Baal and forsake the Best of Creators,-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:126: "God, your Lord and Cherisher and the Lord and Cherisher of your fathers of old?"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:127: But they rejected him, and they will certainly be called up (for punishment),-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:128: Except the sincere and devoted Servants of God (among them).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:129: And We left (this blessing) for him among generations (to come) in later times:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:130: "Peace and salutation to such as Elias!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:131: Thus indeed do We reward those who do right.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:132: For he was one of our believing Servants.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:133: So also was Lut among those sent (by Us).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:134: Behold, We delivered him and his adherents, all
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:135: Except an old woman who was among those who lagged behind:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:137: Verily, ye pass by their (sites), by day-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:138: And by night: will ye not understand?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:139: So also was Jonah among those sent (by Us).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:140: When he ran away (like a slave from captivity) to the ship (fully) laden,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:141: He (agreed to) cast lots, and he was condemned:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:142: Then the big Fish did swallow him, and he had done acts worthy of blame.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:143: Had it not been that he (repented and) glorified God,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:144: He would certainly have remained inside the Fish till the Day of Resurrection.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:145: But We cast him forth on the naked shore in a state of sickness,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:146: And We caused to grow, over him, a spreading plant of the gourd kind.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:147: And We sent him (on a mission) to a hundred thousand (men) or more.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:148: And they believed; so We permitted them to enjoy (their life) for a while.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:149: Now ask them their opinion: Is it that thy Lord has (only) daughters, and they have sons?-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:150: Or that We created the angels female, and they are witnesses (thereto)?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:151: Is it not that they say, from their own invention,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:152: "God has begotten children"? but they are liars!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:153: Did He (then) choose daughters rather than sons?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:154: What is the matter with you? How judge ye?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:155: Will ye not then receive admonition?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:156: Or have ye an authority manifest?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:157: Then bring ye your Book (of authority) if ye be truthful!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:158: And they have invented a blood-relationship between Him and the Jinns: but the Jinns know (quite well) that they have indeed to appear (before his Judgment-Seat)!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:159: Glory to God! (He is free) from the things they ascribe (to Him)!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:160: Not (so do) the Servants of God, sincere and devoted.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:161: For, verily, neither ye nor those ye worship-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:162: Can lead (any) into temptation concerning God,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:163: Except such as are (themselves) going to the blazing Fire!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:164: (Those ranged in ranks say): "Not one of us but has a place appointed;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:165: "And we are verily ranged in ranks (for service);
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:166: "And we are verily those who declare (God’s) glory!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:167: And there were those who said,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:168: "If only we had had before us a Message from those of old,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:169: "We should certainly have been Servants of God, sincere (and devoted)!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:170: But (now that the Qur’an has come), they reject it: But soon will they know!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:171: Already has Our Word been passed before (this) to our Servants sent (by Us),
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:172: That they would certainly be assisted,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:173: And that Our forces,- they surely must conquer.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:174: So turn thou away from them for a little while,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:175: And watch them (how they fare), and they soon shall see (how thou farest)!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:176: Do they wish (indeed) to hurry on our Punishment?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:177: But when it descends into the open space before them, evil will be the morning for those who were warned (and heeded not)!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:178: So turn thou away from them for a little while,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:179: And watch (how they fare) and they soon shall see (how thou farest)!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:180: Glory to thy Lord, the Lord of Honour and Power! (He is free) from what they ascribe (to Him)!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 37:182: And Praise to God, the Lord and Cherisher of the Worlds.

Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:3: and the reciters of a Remembrance,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:5: Lord of the heavens and the earth, and of what between them is Lord of the Easts.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:6: We have adorned the lower heaven with the adornment of the stars
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:7: and to preserve against every rebel Satan;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:8: they listen not to the High Council, for they are pelted from every side,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:9: rejected, and theirs is an everlasting chastisement,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:10: except such as snatches a fragment, and he is pursued by a piercing flame.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:11: So ask them for a pronouncement -- Are they stronger in constitution, or those We created? We created them of clinging clay.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:12: Nay, thou marvellest; and they scoff
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:13: and, when reminded, do not remember
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:14: and, when they see a sign, would scoff;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:15: and they say, ’This is nothing but manifest sorcery.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:16: What, when we are dead and become dust and bones, shall we indeed be raised up?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:17: What, and our fathers, the ancients?’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:19: For it is only a single scaring, then behold, they are watching
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:20: and they say, ’Woe, alas for us! This is the Day of Doom.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:21: ’This is the Day of Decision, even that you cried lies to.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:22: Muster those who did evil, their wives, and that they were serving,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:23: apart from God, and guide them unto the path of Hell!
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:24: And halt them, to be questioned:
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:26: No indeed; but today they resign themselves in submission
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:27: and advance one upon another, asking each other questions.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:28: These say, ’Why, you of old would come to us from the right hand.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:29: Those say, ’No; on the contrary, you were not believers;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:30: we had no authority over you; no, you were an insolent people.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:31: So our Lord’s Word is realised against us; we are tasting it.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:32: Therefore we perverted you, and we ourselves were perverts.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:33: So all of them on that day are sharers in the chastisement.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:34: Even so We do with the sinners;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:35: for when it was said to them, ’There is no god but God,’ they were ever waxing proud,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:36: saying, ’What, shall we forsake our gods for a poet possessed?’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:37: ’No indeed; but he brought the truth, and confirmed the Envoys.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:38: Now certainly you shall be tasting the painful chastisement,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:39: and not be recompensed, except according to what you were doing.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:41: for them awaits a known provision,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:44: upon couches, set face to face,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:45: cup from a spring being passed round to them,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:46: white, a delight to the drinkers,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:47: wherein no sickness is, neither intoxication;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:48: and with them wide-eyed maidens restraining their glances
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:49: as if they were hidden pearls.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:50: They advance one upon another, asking each other questions.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:51: One of them says, ’I had a comrade
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:52: who would say, "Are you a confirmer?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:53: What, when we are dead and become dust and bones, shall we indeed be requited?"
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:55: Then he looks, and sees him in the midst of Hell.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:56: He says, ’By God, wellnigh thou didst destroy me;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:57: But for my Lord’s blessing, I were one of the arraigned.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:58: What, do we then not die
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:59: except for our first death, and are we not chastised?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:60: This is indeed the mighty triumph,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:61: for the like of this let the workers work.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:62: Is that better as a hospitality, or the Tree of Ez-Zakkoum?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:63: We have appointed it as a trial for the evildoers.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:64: It is a tree that comes forth in the root of Hell;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:65: its spathes are as the heads of Satans,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:66: and they eat of it, and of it fill their bellies,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:67: then on top of it they have a brew of boiling water,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:68: then their return is unto Hell.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:70: and they run in their footsteps.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:71: Before them erred most of the ancients,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:72: and We sent among them warners;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:73: and behold, how was the end of them that were warned,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:75: Noah called to Us; and how excellent were the Answerers!
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:76: And We delivered him and his people from the great distress,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:77: and We made his seed the survivors,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:78: and left for him among the later folk
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:79: ’Peace be upon Noah among all beings!’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:80: Even so We recompense the good-doers;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:81: he was among Our believing servants.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:82: Then afterwards We drowned the rest.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:83: Of his party was also Abraham;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:84: when he came unto his Lord with a pure heart,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:85: when he said to his father and his folk, ’What do you serve?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:86: Is it a calumny, gods apart from God, that you desire?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:87: What think you then of the Lord of all Being?’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:88: And he cast a glance at the stars,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:89: and he said, ’Surely I am sick.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:90: But they went away from him, turning their backs.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:91: Then he turned to their gods, and said, ’What do you eat?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:92: What ails you, that you speak not?’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:93: And he turned upon them smiting them with his right hand.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:94: Then came the others to him hastening.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:95: He said, ’Do you serve what you hew,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:96: and God created you and what you make?’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:97: They said, ’Build him a building, and cast him into the furnace!’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:98: They desired to outwit him; so We made them the lower ones.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:99: He said, ’I am going to my Lord; He will guide me.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:100: My Lord, give me one of the righteous.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:101: Then We gave him the good tidings of a prudent boy;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:102: and when he had reached the age of running with him, he said, ’My son, I see in a dream that I shall sacrifice thee; consider, what thinkest thou?’ He said, ’My father, do as thou art bidden; thou shalt find me, God willing, one of the steadfast.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:103: When they had surrendered, and he flung him upon his brow,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:105: thou hast confirmed the vision; even so We recompense the good-doers.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:106: This is indeed the manifest trial.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:107: And We ransomed him with a mighty sacrifice,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:108: and left for him among the later folk
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:110: Even so We recompense the good-doers;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:111: he was among Our believing servants.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:112: Then We gave him the good tidings of Isaac, a Prophet, one of the righteous.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:113: And We blessed him, and Isaac; and of their seed some are good-doers, and some manifest self-wrongers.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:114: We also favoured Moses and Aaron,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:115: and We delivered them and their people from the great distress.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:116: And We helped them, so that they were the victors;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:117: and We gave them the Manifesting Book,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:118: and guided them in the straight path,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:119: and left for them among the later folk
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:121: Even so We recompense the good-doers;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:122: they were among Our believing servants.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:123: Elias too was one of the Envoys;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:124: when he said to his people, ’Will you not be godfearing?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:125: Do you call on Baal, and abandon the Best of creators?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:126: God, your Lord, and the Lord of your fathers, the ancients?’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:127: But they cried him lies; so they will be among the arraigned,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:129: and We left for him among the later folk
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:131: Even so We recompense the good-doers;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:132: he was among Our believing servants.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:133: Lot too was one of the Envoys;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:134: when We delivered him and his people all together,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:135: save an old woman among those that tarried;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:137: and you pass by them in the morning
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:138: and in the night; will you not understand?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:139: Jonah too was one of the Envoys;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:140: when he ran away to the laden ship
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:141: and cast lots, and was of the rebutted,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:142: then the whale swallowed him down, and he blameworthy.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:143: Now had he not been of those that glorify God,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:144: he would have tarried in its belly until the day they shall be raised;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:145: but We cast him upon the wilderness, and he was sick,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:146: and We caused to grow over him a tree of gourds.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:147: Then We sent him unto a hundred thousand, or more,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:148: and they believed; so We gave them enjoyment for a while.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:149: So ask them for a pronouncement -- Has thy Lord daughters, and they sons?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:150: Or did We create the angels females, while they were witnesses?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:151: Is it not of their own calumny that they say,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:152: ’God has begotten?’ They are truly liars.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:153: Has He chosen daughters above sons?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:154: What ails you then, how you judge?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:155: What, and will you not remember?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:156: Or have you a clear authority?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:157: Bring your Book, if you speak truly!
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:158: They have set up a kinship between Him and the jinn; and the jinn know that they shall be arraigned.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:159: Glory be to God above that they describe,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:161: But as for you, and that you serve,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 37:162: you shall not tempt any against Him

Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:1: (I swear) by those who stand in rows,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:2: then by those who prevent firmly,

Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:4: surely your God is but One,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:5: the Lord of the heavens and the earth and what is between them, and Lord of the points of sunrise.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:6: Verily, We have decorated the nearest sky with an adornment, the stars,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:7: and (have made them) a security against every rebellious devil.

Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:9: to be driven off, and for them there is a lasting punishment;
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:10: however, if one snatches a little bit, he is pursued by a bright flame.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:11: Now ask them, “Are they stronger in the formation of their bodies, or those (other beings) that We have created?” Certainly, We did create them from sticky clay.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:12: But you wonder (at their denial), and they mock (at the idea of an Hereafter).
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:13: And when any advice is given to them, they pay no heed to it.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:14: And when they see a sign, they make fun of it,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:15: and say, “This is nothing but an open magic.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:16: Is it when we have died and become dust and bones, that we shall be raised again,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:17: and even our fathers of aforetime?”
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:18: Say, “Yes, and you shall be disgraced (too)!”
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:19: So, it will be only a single castigating call, and all of a sudden they will begin to see.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:20: And they will be saying, “Woe to us; this is the Day of Retribution.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:21: (It will be said to them,) “This is the Day of Judgment that you used to deny.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:22: (It will be said to the angels,) “Muster all those who were unjust, and their fellows, and whatever they used to worship
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:23: other than Allah, and show them the way to Jahannam ,

Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:25: (Then they will be asked, “What is wrong with you that you do not help each other?”
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:26: On the contrary, that day all of them will have totally surrendered.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:27: And some of them (the followers of their chiefs) will turn to others (the chiefs), asking questions from one another.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:28: They (the followers) will say, “You were the ones who used to come to (mislead) us forcefully.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:29: They (the chiefs) will say, “On the contrary, you yourselves were not believers.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:30: We had no authority over you at all, but you yourselves were a transgressing people.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:31: So, the word of our Lord has come true against us.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:32: We did misguide you, (because) we were ourselves erroneous”.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:33: So, that day, they will share each other in punishment.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:34: This is how We deal with the criminals.

Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 37:36: and used to say, “Are we really to leave our gods because of an insane poet?”
